rules_text: Draw three cards, then manifest wonder. Put X +1/+1 counters on that creature, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control named Far-Off Lands. [i](Draw a card, then put a card from your hand onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
